item.title: Blog Post
item.description: Intro In this blog post, I will be examining the sleep data of mammals. Animals have always interested me, so I want to take a look at some characteristics of their sleep data. I will conduct this task by using both R and Python code chunks. Code library(ggplot2) library(tidyverse) ## ── Attaching packages ────────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse 1.3.0 ── ## ✓ tibble 3.0.3 ✓ dplyr 1.0.1 ## ✓ tidyr 1.1.1 ✓ stringr 1.
